about.title: ABOUT
about.firstDescription: With more than a year of experience writing code, I consider myself a proactive person, eager to keep learning and getting deeper into this beautiful industry.
about.secondDescription: Looking forward to working on innovative projects together with an excellent team, as well as developing my 'Indie Hacker' profile and building applications that improve people's lives while building a business around them.

experience.title: EXPERIENCE
experience.firstExperienceTitle: Full Stack Develper at Ait Solutions
experience.firstExperienceDescription: Working at Boxer Gestión, contributing to the growth of the product through ideas and the development of new functionalities with my technical knowledge. Also, in the creation area, working to create the company's next product from the creation and evaluation of different 'mvp' (minimum viable product).
experience.secondExperienceDescription: Working on Boxer Gestión and Duck Gestión, management systems that allow companies to streamline their work processes with functions such as managing their inventory, invoicing what is necessary to comply with tax obligations, among others. Contributing to the growth of both products through ideas and the development of new functionalities with my technical knowledge.
experience.thirdExperienceDescription: On December 29, 2021, I started my journey to become a software engineer with a solid determination and strong commitment to develop applications that positively impact people's quality of life.

projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.firstProjectDescription: Frères is an existing clothing brand whose products I have always liked, I thought their website could have a better design so I set out to improve it.
projects.secondProjectDescription: Entrenally is a self-management application to help coaches perform all tasks related to their work in one place and in a simple way.
